traits.name: Hold Breath
entries: The two-headed crocodile can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

traits.name: Two Heads
entries: The two-headed crocodile has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

traits.name: Wakeful
entries: When one of the crocodile's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The two-headed crocodile makes two attacks with its bite.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2 damage) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and that head of the crocodile can't bite another target.
